name: Sliver of Meat
acquisition: Dropped by herbivorous bests Horse (10% base) Deer (8% base) Rabbitgaroo (8% base) Sheep (8% base) Nomadic Merchant's Mule (8% base) Unlimited stock at Twin Maiden Husks Meat Peddler's Bell Bearing
farming: Church of Pilgrimage: Traveling southwest from the church towards the Walking Mausoleum, you run into three herds of Sheep. Craftsman's Shack: Right next to the site of grace is a large herd of Sheep.

name: Strip of White Flesh
acquisition: Found exceedingly rarely throughout The Lands Between Dropped by creatures devoid of blood Giant Crayfish (100%) Turtle (25% base) Giant Land Octopus (25% base) Land Octopus (5% base) Giant Crab (25% base) Crab (3% base) Giant Oracle Envoy (20% base) Large Oracle Envoy (6% base) Giant Land Squirt (8% base) Land Squirt (4% base) Slug (4% base) Oracle Envoy (4% base)
farming: Summonwater Village: Eight Turtles can be found in and around the basement where the Green Turtle Talisman can be found.

name: Beast Liver
acquisition: Dropped by herbivorous beasts Horse (10% base) Deer (8% base) Rabbitgaroo (8% base) Sheep (8% base) Nomadic Merchant's mule: (6% base)
farming: Church of Pilgrimage: Traveling southwest from the church towards the Walking Mausoleum, you run into three herds of Sheep. Craftsman's Shack: Right next to the site of grace is a large herd of Sheep. By Ancestral Woods Site of Grace in Siofra River Well: There are many beasts in this area.

name: Beast Blood
acquisition: Dropped by carnivorous beasts Lesser Runebear (100%) Bear (5%) Lion Guardian except in Fort Gael and Capital Outskirts (100%) Giant Skeletal Slime (25% base) Giant Dog (8% base) Dog (6% base) Giant Crow (8% base) Boar (5% base, only some) Nomadic Merchant's mule: (6% base)
farming: Third Church of Marika Site of Grace in Limgrave: Travel south into the woods for a group of Boars and, further along, Lesser Runebears.

name: Lump of Flesh
acquisition: Finite spawns Dropped by Boar (25% base) Lesser Runebear (25% base) Bear (25% base) Wolf (5% base) Dog (5% base, only some) Unlimited stock at Twin Maiden Husks  Meat Peddler's Bell Bearing
farming: Third Church of Marika: Travel south into the woods for a group of Boars and, further along, Bears.

name: Turtle Neck Meat
acquisition: Dropped by turtles Turtle (100%) Miriel, Pastor of Vows (x12, 100% if you're heartless) Unlimited stock at Twin Maiden Husks Meat Peddler's Bell Bearing
farming: Summonwater Village: Eight Turtles can be found in and around the basement where the Green Turtle Talisman can be found.

name: Albinauric Bloodclot
acquisition: Finite spawns Dropped by First-Generation Albinauric (4% base) Second-Generation Albinauric (2.5% base) Albinauric Wolfback Archer (15% base)
farming: Village of the Albinaurics: Kill the Albinauric behind the house and the ones on the bridge. These are easier to kill and have a better drop rate than the froglike second-generation Albinaurics found elsewhere in Liurnia. Volcano Manor: Kill the Albinaurics in the room accessible through the shortcut in the entry hall (where you found the Volcano Manor Seedbed Curse).

name: Budding Horn
acquisition: Dropped by herbivorous beasts Deer (2.5% base) Sheep (2.5% base) Ancestral Follower (2.5% base) Ancestral Follower Shaman (2.5% base)
farming: Church of Pilgrimage: Traveling southwest from the church towards the Walking Mausoleum, you run into three herds of Sheep. Craftsman's Shack: Right next to the site of grace is a large herd of Sheep.

name: Old Fang
acquisition: Found rarely throughout The Lands Between Finite spawns Dropped by carnivorous beasts Lion Guardian (x2, 100%) Boar (5% base) Misbegotten with Iron Cleaver (5% base) Other Misbegotten (2.5% base) Leonine Misbegotten (2.5% base)
farming: Castle Morne: There are eight Misbegotten in the central courtyard.

name: Flight Pinion
acquisition: Dropped by Eagle (62.5% base) Guillemot (47.5% base) Warhawk (15% base)
farming: Church of Elleh: Travel directly west, killing Eagles along the way, until you reach a cliff. Safely drop down onto the square-shaped ruin to find six Guillemots, then continue down the cliffs to the west to reach another square-shaped ruin with seven Eagles. Continue northwest along the beach to find more birds. Use ranged attacks to prevent them from flying away. Below the Well Site of Grace in Siofra River: Turn around, kill 4 eagles on the right, 2 eagles on the left, then walk back to the grace. Use ranged or AOE attacks.

name: Stormhawk Feather
acquisition: Found exceedingly rarely throughout The Lands Between Finite spawns Dropped by stormhawks Exile Soldier (2% base) Large Exile Soldier (2% base) Warhawk (15% base)
farming: Rampart Tower Site of Grace in Stormveil Castle: There are several Warhawks out the north door.

name: Four-Toed Fowl Foot
acquisition: Dropped by birds:  Guillemot (25% base) Eagle (8% base)
farming: Church of Elleh: Travel directly west, killing Eagles along the way, until you reach a cliff. Safely drop down onto the square-shaped ruin to find six Guillemots, then continue down the cliffs to the west to reach another square-shaped ruin with seven Eagles. Continue northwest along the beach to find more birds. Use ranged attacks to prevent them from flying away. Fourth Church of Marika: Drop down to the beach northwest of the Site of Grace and use ranged attacks to kill the many Guillemots there. A single run takes around 1 minute 30 seconds.

name: Slumbering Egg
acquisition: Dropped by Owl (100%)
farming: Warmaster's Shack: Climb the small cliff to the east of the grace to find an Owl next to six Tarnished Golden Sunflowers. South of the Lookout Tower Site of Grace in Weeping Peninsula: An Owl sits perched on a small cliff exactly northwest of the site of grace, about an 11 second horseback ride away.

name: Crab Eggs
acquisition: Dropped by Giant Crab (100%) Crab (3% base) Giant Crayfish by gazebo south of Fallen Ruins of the Lakes Site of Grace (25% base)
farming: Agheel Lake South Site of Grace in Limgrave: A large colony of Crabs, as well as one Giant Crab, can be found just northwest.

name: Land Octopus Ovary
acquisition: Finite spawns Dropped by Giant Land Octopus (100%) Land Octopus (5% base)
farming: Temple Quarter: Six Giant Land Octopi are just southwest of the Site of Grace.

name: Thin Beast Bones
acquisition: Dropped by beasts Deer (62.5% base) Rabbitgaroo (62.5% base) Sheep (62.5% base) Wolf (25% base) Giant Skeletal Slime (6x, 25% base) Skeletal Slime (15% base, only some) Non-archer Ancestral Follower (10% base) Ancestral Follower Shaman (10% base) Dog (8% base) Nomadic Merchant's mule (10% base) Unlimited stock at Twin Maiden Husks Bone Peddler's Bell Bearing
farming: Craftsman's Shack: Right next to the Site of Grace is a large herd of Sheep. Use area of effect attacks for the highest efficiency.

name: Hefty Beast Bone
acquisition: Dropped by particularly large beasts Lesser Runebear (50% base) Bear (47.5% base) Boar (15% base) Giant Skeletal Slime (6x, 25% base) Skeletal Slime (15% base) Giant Crow (8% base) Giant Dog (8% base) Unlimited stock at Twin Maiden Husks Bone Peddler's Bell Bearing
farming: Third Church of Marika: Travel south into the woods for a group of Boars and, further along, Bears.

name: Human Bone Shard
acquisition: Found by hunting Those Who Live in Death Finite spawns Dropped by Celebrant (10% base) Commoner (10% base, only some) Skeletal Militiaman (5% base) Tibia Mariner (5% base)
farming: Windmill Village: A massive group of Celebrants is just uphill from the Site of Grace.

name: Great Dragonfly Head
acquisition: Finite spawns Dropped by Giant Dragonfly (75% base)
farming: Heart of Aeonia Site of Grace in Caelid: Just east of the Site of Grace is a group of six Giant Dragonflies.

name: Gold Firefly
acquisition: Found in waters close to Minor Erdrees Infinitely spawns
farming: Mistwood Outskirts Site of Grace in Limgrave: 9 is a pond to the southeast, near two Lesser Runebears.

name: Silver Firefly
acquisition: Found near cold waters untouched by sunlight. Infinitely spawns Dropped by Clayman (4% base)
farming: Ainsel River Main Site of Grace in Ainsel River: Head north from the Site of Grave to find 4 on your right and 2 on your left that you can circle back for. Run back to the Site of Grace, rest, and repeat. Groveside Cave: Travel directly forward through the cave to find a small waterfall with 5. Made easier by using the Beast-Repellent Torch to stop wolves from attacking.

name: Glintstone Firefly
acquisition: Found at/near Liurnia of the Lakes Infinitely spawns Dropped by Fanged Imp throwing Magic Pots (10% base) First-Generation Albinauric Sorerers (12% base) Glintstone Crab (5% base) Crystal Snail (2% base)
farming: Scenic Isle Site of Grace in Liurnia of the Lakes: Covering a massive crystal west of the Site of Grace. [Map Link] Royal Moongazing Grounds Site of Grace in Liurnia of the Lakes: 4 on crystals just out the door to the Three Sisters. [Map Link]

name: Smoldering Butterfly
acquisition: Found near wildfires and elsewhere Infinitely spawns Dropped by Flame Chariot (x5, 100%, first kill only) Raya Lucaria Soldier (40% base, only some) Thorn-Fire Sorcerer (25% base) Leyndell Soldier (20% base, only some) Radahn Soldier (20% base, only some) Haligtree Soldier (20% base, only some) Highwayman (20% base, only some) Blackflame Monk (15% base) Burning Slug (10% base) Fanged Imp (10% base, only some) Skeletal Militiamen (8% base, only some)
farming: Warmaster's Shack: Eight north-northeast on a fire patch with two Burning Slugs.

name: Aeonian Butterfly
acquisition: Found near scarlet rot Finite spawns Dropped by Kindred of Rot (1.5% base) Basilisk (8% base)
farming: Grand Cloister: From the Site of Grace, run along the south side of the Lake of Rot to find 4 Basilisks, then towards the ruins for 8 more. Roll around in the rot and then going back on land before it fully builds up to trigger a less damaging form of rot.

name: Nascent Butterfly
acquisition: Found rarely throughout The Lands Between Finite spawns Dropped by Ancestral Follower Shaman (20%, only some)
farming: Ancestral Woods Site of Grace in Siofra River: Drops from Ancestral Follower Shamans in this area.

name: Golden Centipede
acquisition: Found near churches and similar Finite spawns Dropped by Guardian by the Minor Erdtree Church (4% base)
farming: Minor Erdtree Church: Kill all the nearby Guardians.

name: Living Jar Shard
acquisition: Finite spawns Dropped by Living Jar (1%-5%) Large Living Jar (20% base, guaranteed to drop one the first time they're killed)
farming: Secluded Cell Site of Grace in Stormveil Castle: Walk straight forwards from the grace to find seven Living Jars and one Large Living Jar. Royal Moongazing Grounds Site of Grace in Caria Manor: From the Site of Grace, go back into the manor and drop off a series of platforms to the south-southwest to find a large Living Jar and a number of small ones. After clearing this group out, you can keep descending the cliffside to find more Living Jars for a total of twelve small jars and three large ones.

name: Silver Tear Husk
acquisition: Found at/near the Eternal City Infinitely spawns Dropped by Silver Tear (4% base) Silver Orb (4% base)
farming: Northern Hallowhorn Grounds: One outside the entrance, seven just inside, and two are up the ladder to the northeast of the temple for a total of ten per run.

name: Gold-Tinged Excrement
acquisition: Found in woods and thickets Infinitely spawns Dropped by Lesser Wormface (25% base) Wormface (25% base) Lesser Runebear (25% base) Boar (15% base)
farming: Third Church of Marika: Travel south into the woods for a group of Boars, then grab more on the ground past them.

name: Blood-Tainted Excrement
acquisition: Found at/near Mohgwyn Palace Infinitely spawns Dropped by Rotten Giant Crow (50% base)
farming: Palace Approach Ledge-Road Site of Grace in Mohgwyn Palace: Ride downhill, run left of the single Albinauric next to the big rock pillar and grab one near the small tree, then run to the next small tree behind the circle of Albinaurics and grab another. Keep running straight to the smaller rock pillar and grab one, southwest to the next small pillar near the wall for another, then southeast to the tall weeds next to circling Albinaurics for two more. Go west from there to grab one behind three Albinaurics and another on a dead bird's head, then run into the area full of Giant Crows and follow the right wall grabbing as many as you can before the Crows kill you.

name: Yellow Ember
acquisition: Found at/near  lands afflicted by frenzy Frenzied Flame Village Callu Baptismal Church Infinitely spawns Dropped by Frenzied Giant Rat (5% base) Frenzied Rat (2.5% base) Frenzied Commoner (1.5% base)
farming: Cathedral of the Forsaken: Five or so found throughout the area above the Frenzied Flame Proscription. Yelough Anix Ruins: On the ground throughout the ruins. Ten per run if you look hard, and easily six or seven if you run through. A Stake of Marika is nearby, so you can have the Rats respawn you rather than walk back from Yelough Anix Tunnel.

name: Rowa Fruit
acquisition: Found easily throughout The Lands Between. Infinitely spawns Dropped by Wandering Nobles (25% base)
farming: Jarburg: Along the main street along with Tarnished Golden Sunflowers, Poisonblooms, and Grave Violets.

name: Golden Rowa
acquisition: Found in Altus Plateau Infinitely spawns
farming: Bower of Bounty Site of Grace in Altus Plateau: Four in the immediate vicinity.

name: Rimed Rowa
acquisition: Found in Mountaintops of the Giants Infinitely spawns
farming: Ancient Snow Valley Ruins Site of Grace in Mountaintops of the Giants: Four surrounding the Site of Grace.

name: Herba
acquisition: Found in thickets and elsewhere Infinitely spawns Dropped by Wandering Nobles (6% base)
farming: The Four Belfries: Three can be found on the far side of the closest tower to the Site of Grace.

name: Dewkissed Herba
acquisition: Found in underground cities Infinitely spawns Dropped by Fallen Hawks Soldier (8% base)
farming: Siofra River Bank Site of Grace in Siofra River: Seven grow slightly southeast. [Map Link]

name: Arteria Leaf
acquisition: Found rarely throghout The Lands Between Finite spawns Dropped by Fuzzy Trolls on Mountaintops of the Giants (30% base)
farming: Giant's Gravepost Site of Grace in Mountaintops of the Giants: Kill the Troll just west of the grace.

name: Mushroom
acquisition: Found in damp thickets and elsewhere Infinitely spawns Dropped by Godrick Soldier throwing Fire Pots (20% base) Castle Guards (15% base) Radahn Soldier wearing Foot Soldier Helm and throwing Fire Pots (20% base) Radahn Soldier wearing Radahn Soldier Helm and throwing Fire Pots (15% base) Fanged Imp throwing Fire Pots (10% base) Skeletal Militiaman throwing Fire Pots (10% base) Putrid Corpse (5% base, only some) Rotten Putrid Corpse (12% base, only some)
farming: Village of the Albinaurics: two by the tree east of the grace site, then one just north of the grace.

name: Toxic Mushroom
acquisition: Found at/near rotten lands Infinitely spawns Dropped by Servant of Rot (15% base) Scarlet Rot Putrid Corpse (12%, only some) Putrid Corpse in The Shaded Castle (5% base)
farming: Heart of Aeonia Site of Grace in Caelid: Two behind the branch just to the southeast.

name: Melted Mushroom
acquisition: Found in and around the Eternal City Infinitely spawns Dropped by Putrid Corpse (5% base, only some) Scarlet Rot Putrid Corpse (12% base, only some)
farming: Siofra River Bank Site of Grace in Siofra River: One north and above the grace, another west on the ledge above the Giant Crab, two more at the roots of the trees past the Crab.

name: Erdleaf Flower
acquisition: Found easily throughout The Lands Between Infinitely spawns Dropped by Wandering Nobles (3% base)
farming: The Four Belfries: Three are next to the Site of Grace, and another is behind a nearby rock.

name: Faded Erdleaf Flower
acquisition: Found in Caelid and Dragonbarrow. Infinitely spawns Dropped by Lesser Kindred of Rot except in Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree (15% base)
farming: Fort Faroth: A handful spawn just to the southwest.

name: Fire Blossom
acquisition: Found in the Mountaintops of the Giants Infinitely spawns Dropped by Flame Chariot (x3, 100%, first kill only) Fire Monk (5% base) Blackflame Monk (5% base) Wandering Nobles in the Consecrated Snowfield (25% base)
farming: Freezing Lake Site of Grace in Mountaintops of the Giants: Head southwest along the right bank of the frozen river towards the Shack of the Lofty. Once you reach it, turn south and use the spiritspring to continue towards Nomadic Merchant Mountaintops East. This yields about 30 per run in about a minute.

name: Poisonbloom
acquisition: Found on poisoned ground Infinitely spawns Dropped by Giant Miranda Sprout (x5, 100%) Miranda Sprout (10%-20% base) Land Squirt (8% base) Giant Land Squirt (8% base)
farming: Castle Morne: Eight in the swamp to the northeast. Jarburg: Along the main street along with Tarnished Golden Sunflowers, Rowa Fruit, and Grave Violets.

name: Fulgurbloom
acquisition: Found in lightning-struck lands Infinitely spawns Dropped by Electric Sheep (20% base) Fanged Imp throwing Lightning Pots in Wyndham Catacombs (10% base) Leyndell Soldier throwing Lightning Pots (5% base)
farming: Rampart-Side Path Site of Grace in Altus Plateau: There are 10 to 12 up the hill where the lightning is striking.

name: Altus Bloom
acquisition: Found in Altus Plateau Infinitely spawns Dropped by Perfumer (x5, 8% base) Depraved Perfumer (x5, 15% base)
farming: Road of Iniquity Side Path Site of Grace in Altus Plateau: There are 5 blooms in close proximity southwest of the Site of Grace.

name: Bloodrose
acquisition: Found near blood-soaked soil Infinitely spawns Dropped by Sanguine Noble (15% base) Putrid Corpse in Mohgwyn Palace (8% base) Unlimited stock at Imprisoned Merchant
farming: Fort Haight: 6 bushes can be farmed here: 1 at the entrance stairway, 2 behind the castle, and 3 within the fort's courtyard. After collecting them, teleporting back to the Site of Grace is faster than going back on foot, since the fort is a no-riding zone. [Map Link] Rose Church: 9 bushes (1 on the pathway leading up to the church, by the fallen tree) can be farmed here. The enemies are easily avoided on horseback. The total run from the Site of Grace to the church collecting all the bushes takes about 45-60 seconds, but you can die to respawn at the Stake of Marika in front of the church, making the process way faster. [Map Link]

name: Grave Violet
acquisition: Found at/near graveyards and catacombs Infinitely spawns Dropped by Wraith Callers on horses (15% base) Commoner (5% base, only some) Skeletal Militiamen in catacombs (4% base, only some)
farming: Jarburg: Along the main street along with Tarnished Golden Sunflowers, Poisonblooms, and Rowa Fruit.

name: Tarnished Golden Sunflower
acquisition: Found near Minor Erdtrees Infinitely spawns Dropped by Guardian (4% base)
farming: Minor Erdtree (Mistwood): 21 around the tree.  Jarburg: Follow the main street to collect these as well as stocking up on Rowa Fruit, Poisonblooms, and Grave Violets.

name: Golden Sunflower
acquisition: Found near Minor Erdtrees Infinitely spawns Dropped by Soldier Wandering Noble (8%, only some)
farming:
Around Minor Erdtree (Altus Plateau) 
       Around Minor Erdtree (Capital Outskirts) 
       Purchase at: Hermit Merchant

name: Trina's Lily
acquisition: Found exceedingly rarely throughout The Lands Between Finite spawns Dropped by Spirit Jellyfish by Apostate Derelict (8% base) Cleanrot Knight (2% base)
farming: Apostate Derelict: Killing all the jellyfish around here takes about a minute.

name: Miquella's Lily
acquisition: Found rarely throughout The Lands Between Finite spawns Dropped by Cleanrot Knight in Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree (3% base) Haligtree Knight (8% base) Haligtree Soldier wearing Haligtree Helm (4% base, only some) Miranda Sprout in Miquella's Haligtree (3% base, unconfirmed)
farming: Elphael Inner Wall Site of Grace in Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: There are two Haligtree Knights right outside the large door.

name: Crystal Bud
acquisition: Found in Liurnia of the Lakes Infinitely spawns
farming: Revenger's Shack: Two total, one about 12 steps southeast of the Site of Grace and another on the northwest side. If you walk around the shack, you can also find five Root Resin, as well as Rowa Fruit, Mushroom, Gold-Tinged Excrement, and an Erdleaf Flower in the area. [Map Link]

name: Rimed Crystal Bud
acquisition: Found in cold regions Infinitely spawns Dropped by Giant Crayfish in Mountaintops of the Giants (50% base) Wandering Nobles in Consecrated Snowfield (15% base)
farming: Ordina Liturgical Town: Eleven to the west and slightly south, around a giant frozen tree trunk.

name: Sacramental Bud
acquisition: Found exceedingly rarely throughout The Lands Between. Finite spawns Dropped by Rotten Stray in Writheblood Ruins (3% base) Land Octopus (3% base, only some) Giant Skeletal Slime in Writheblood Ruins (20% base)
farming: Writheblood Ruins: There are seven Rotten Strays and a Giant Skeletal Slime among the ruins.

name: Eye of Yelough
acquisition: Found in lands afflicted by frenzy Ailing Village Frenzied Flame Village Finite spawns Dropped by Frenzied Troll Knight in Yelough Anix Ruins (30%)
farming: Yelough Anix Ruins: Kill all the Frenzied Troll Knights. Dying and respawning at the Stake of Marika is faster than going back to the Site of Grace.

name: Miranda Powder
acquisition: Finite spawns Dropped by Giant Miranda Sprout (100%) Miranda Sprout (5% base) Depraved Perfumer (x3, 15% base) Perfumer (x3, 8% base)
farming: Perfumer's Grotto: There are four Perfumers in the first room.

name: Root Resin
acquisition: Found near trees or the roots of the Greattree Infinitely spawns
farming: Warmaster's Shack: Ten feet northeast of the Site of Grace.

name: Cave Moss
acquisition: Found in dark caves Infinitely spawns
farming: Coastal Cave: Several available in this cave.

name: Budding Cave Moss
acquisition: Found at/near dark caves Infinitely spawns Dropped by Depraved Perfumer (x5, 15% base) Perfumer (x5, 8% base)
farming: Can be farmed in large quantities by spawning at Subterranean Inquistion Chamber and running towards the cave before the Abductor Virgins under Volcano Manor.

name: Crystal Cave Moss
acquisition: Found in dark caves Infinitely spawns
farming: Sellia Hideaway: One right next to the Site of Grace.

name: String
acquisition: Found rarely throughout The Lands Between Finite spawns Dropped by Demi-Human (5% base) Demi-Human Chief (5% base)
farming: Coastal Cave: Eight Demi-Humans in the first room.

name: Sanctuary Stone
acquisition: Found rarely near the remains of fallen ruins Infinitely spawns Infinite sold for 600 runes by Twin Maiden Husks after giving them the Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing (4) Dropped by   Mad Pumpkin Head (100%) Abnormal Stone Cluster (4% base) Azula Beastman (8% base)
farming: Scenic Isle Site of Grace in Liurnia of the Lakes: Six on the ruins directly north.

name: Cracked Crystal
acquisition: Found in crystal caves Infinitely spawns Dropped by Miners with glowing blue backpacks (20% base) Giant Miranda Sprout (100%, only one Unlimited stock at Twin Maiden Husks Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing (2)
farming: Sellia Crystal Tunnel: Twenty in the first room, guarded by two Lesser Kindred of Rot.

name: Volcanic Stone
acquisition: Found near Mt. Gelmir Infinitely spawns Dropped by Man-Serpent (20% base) Abnormal Stone Cluster (8% base, only some)
farming: Seethewater Terminus Site of Grace in Mt. Gelmir: Running from this Site of Grace to the Seethewater River and back the other way can net over 100 each leg.

name: Formic Rock
acquisition: Found at/near Ainsel River and other places where giant ants live Finite spawns Dropped by Giant Ant (1.5% base) Giant Ant Queen (5% base)
farming: Deeproot Depths Site of Grace in Deeproot Depths: Several Giant Ants are just east of the Site of Grace.

name: Gravel Stone
acquisition: Found in lands once beset by ancient dragons Finite spawns Dropped by Farum Azula Dragon south of Dragon Temple Lift Site of Grace (x3, 100%) Azula Beastman using red lightning magic (3% base) Silver Tear that explodes in lightning (1.5% base) Miner in Yelough Anix Tunnel (4% base)
farming: Beside the Greatbridge Site of Grace in Crumbling Farum Azula: Go down the elevator and into the watery room to find two lightning-casting Azula Beastman. Dragon Temple Lift Site of Grace in Crumbling Farum Azula: Kill the Farum Azula Dragon to the south. Although this is much harder than the other farming run, it's guaranteed to drop 3 Gravel Stone each time.

name: Ruin Fragment
acquisition: Found at/near places where ruins have fallen from the sky Infinitely spawns Infinite sold for 100 runes by Twin Maiden Husks after giving them the Smithing-Stone Miner's Bell Bearing [4] Dropped by Abnormal Stone Cluster (100%) Giant Dog (15%, only some) Wandering Noble near ruins (15% base) Demi-Human (4% base) Demi-Human Chief (4% base)
farming: Liurnia Tower Bridge Site of Grace in Divine Tower of Liurnia: Fourteen can be farmed in seconds (along with three Sanctuary Stones) by running across the bridge on horseback and either running or fast traveling back. (Carian Inverted Statue is required to reach this Site of Grace.)
